rule.name: Order Side Check
rule.description: Trade would sell more than the current position

rule.name: Max 10% in US
rule.description: Sum of MarketValue of all the securities with Country not equal to benchmark countries should not be greater than 10% of account NAV.

rule.name: Max 10 Percent EM
rule.description: Sum of MarketValue of all the securities for Emerging Countries, should not be greater than 10% of account NAV.

constantValue.name: Country_to_check
constantValue.value: Saudi Arabia, TAIWAN, China, South Korea, India, United Arab Emirates, Brazil, Uruguay, Indonesia, RUSSIA, Hong Kong, SINGAPORE, Mexico, Kuwait, Qatar, South Africa, TURKEY, THAILAND, CHILE, MALAYSIA, Kazakhstan, Colombia, Czech Republic, Poland, Vietnam, Philippines, MACAU, Hungary, PERU, Romania, Argentina, Lebanon, Morocco, Curacao, Panama, Nigeria, Puerto Rico, Croatia, Kenya, Jordan, Egypt, Oman, Slovenia, Bahrain, Iraq, Senegal, Ivory Coast, Trinidad and Tobago, Bangladesh, Cambodia, Pakistan, Mauritius, Slovakia, Georgia, Cayman Islands, Barbados, Ecuador, Bahamas, Ghana, Lithuania, Mozambique, Tanzania, Costa Rica, Mongolia, Serbia, Estonia, Tunisia, Montenegro, Uganda, Jamaica, British Virgin Islands, Sri Lanka, Botswana, Ukraine, Macedonia, Palestine, Bulgaria, Gabon, Bosnia And Herzegovina, Malawi, Namibia, Zambia, Burkina Faso, Canada

rule.name: Max 10% Issuer
rule.description: Sum of market value of securities of a single issuer should not be greater than 10% of Account NAV.

rule.name: Max 10 Percent US
rule.description: Sum of Exposure of all the securities with country as US should not be greater than 10% of account NAV.

rule.name: Sector Concentration
rule.description: Pre-Trade Alert when master account sector concentration goes above limit.
